entries.title: The best movies shot on phones
entries.description: It is possible to make a good movie with nothing but a phone and there are plenty of examples to show it.

entries.title: The Echo Show 15 may be the best screen for your kitchen island
entries.description: With the recent Fire TV update, the Echo Show 15 has become a fantastic all-in-one smart display.

entries.title: I’m so fed up with streaming platforms that I’m going back to physical DVDs
entries.description: It's time to set sail for calmer waters.

entries.title: Testing spatial audio on the Pixel 7 is a confusing but delightful experience
entries.description: Toggling the setting is only the first step in your long journey toward finding compatible content to try it.
